org.sakaiproject.calendar.api

Interface CalendarEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AttachmentContainer, Comparable, Entity
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CalendarEventEdit
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseCalendarService.BaseCalendarEventEdit, BaseExternalCalendarSubscriptionService.ExternalCalendarEvent, GenericCalendarImporter.PrototypeEvent

    public interface CalendarEvent
extends Entity, Comparable, AttachmentContainer

    CalendarEvent is the interface for events placed into a Calendar Service Calendar.

    Each event has a time range, and other information in the event's (Resource) properties.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  CalendarEvent.EventAccess
      EventAccess enumerates different access modes for the event: site-wide or grouped.

    • Field Summary
